name: decompose-url
description: A quick and intuitive URL decomposer which provides a straight-forward and powerful mechanism for decomposing URLs into their constituent parts. Originally designed for use with Node.js, it can also be used directly in the browser.
author: David Pate <me@davidtpate.com> (http://davidtpate.com)
